Margin

margin between 0 to 5

Generic

.m-auto
margin auto
.m-0
margin 0px
.m-1
margin 20px (defined: --margin-1)
.m-2
margin 40px (defined: --margin-2)
.m-3
margin 60px (defined: --margin-3)
.m-4
margin 80px (defined: --margin-4)
.m-5
margin 100px (defined: --margin-5)

Prefix

.my-*
margin top and bottom (0 to 5)
.mx-*
margin left and right (0 to 5)
.ml-* (margin-left) or ms-* (margin-start)
margin left (0 to 5)
.mr-* (margin-right) or me-* (margin-end)
margin right (0 to 5)
.mt-* (margin-top)
margin top (0 to 5)
.mb-* (margin-bottom)
margin bottom (0 to 5)
